info.name: Display accesskeys, enhanced
info.description: Variation of the style 2191 intended for usage with userscript to display accesskey of elements otherwise inaccessible.
info.additionalInfo:
In cooperation with the userscript: "accesskeys-reveal" ( http://userscripts-mirror.org/scripts/show/8376 ) solves impossibility to add CSS-generated content after form elements, so this one will show you accesskeys of any input and textarea.

Try / test it here:
http://eldar.cz/myf/pub/firefox/accesskeys-test-area.html

Changelog:
